channel.title: Help with moparscape
channel.description:
i have 3 questions
1: how do i make myself an admin on MY own server 2: how do i make monsters move and not have 0hp 3: how do i make dragon 2h and axe \be useable and how can i make doors that wont open, open

item.title: Help with moparscape
item.dc:creator: @The_rune_pur3 The rune pur3
item.description:
@The_rune_pur3 wrote:

1: open up character files, look for your name, edit your rights to 3
1=mod
2=admin
3=owner
hope that helped

Read full topic
